p: EV-A71 strain 41 (5865/SIN/000009, GenBank accession no. AF316321; subgenogroup B4) was used for construction of infectious clones using a DNA-launched strategy as reported previously [ 86]. Unlike its original sequence, this lab strain had been propagated in tissue culture previously and had acquired a VP1-E145Q mutation. We have denoted this strain as KEQ.
